text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2

Product specifications:
Sizzix original die
2.75H x 4.75W - Small Dies
Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75
Steel-rule construction
Can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock; fabric foam; magnet; metallic foil; photos; vellum; and sandpaper
Compatible with the original sizzix machine and the bigkick and big shot machines
text.Response A: This great die by Ellison Sizzix Originals can cut through 3 sheets of cardstock, fabric, foam, magnet, metallic foil, photo, sandpaper, or vellum. This package contains one steel-rule die with a design size of 3-1/2x3-1/2 inches. Design: Large Squares #2.
text.Response B: With its steel-rule construction, the Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2 can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock, fabric, foam, magnet, metallic foil, photos, vellum, or sandpaper. Measuring 4.75 by 2.75 inches, this die is compatible with the original Sizzix machine as well as the Bigkick and Big Shot machines and is a Sizzix original die.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

378.displayed_text:
Prompt

Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2

Product specifications:
Sizzix original die
2.75H x 4.75W - Small Dies
Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75
Steel-rule construction
Can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock; fabric foam; magnet; metallic foil; photos; vellum; and sandpaper
Compatible with the original sizzix machine and the bigkick and big shot machines

Response A

This great die by Ellison Sizzix Originals can cut through 3 sheets of cardstock, fabric, foam, magnet, metallic foil, photo, sandpaper, or vellum. This package contains one steel-rule die with a design size of 3-1/2x3-1/2 inches. Design: Large Squares #2.

Response B

With its steel-rule construction, the Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2 can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock, fabric, foam, magnet, metallic foil, photos, vellum, or sandpaper. Measuring 4.75 by 2.75 inches, this die is compatible with the original Sizzix machine as well as the Bigkick and Big Shot machines and is a Sizzix original die.
